title.narrative: Sarkhet Batal - The Scream of the Champion

description.narrative: Sarkhet Batal is a project aimed at removing children out of the limestone and marble quarries in Egypt and capacitate the children with skills and knowledge; improving the living standards of the families (education, income diversification, access to (health) services); addressing the due diligence of the quarries in terms of pricing, health and safety standards, etc.; develop a model quarry; and set up an additional business that will finance the project beyond the FBK funding.
